description: The tough new curbs on travel, businesses and gatherings are aimed at tackling a Covid-19 surge.
title: Coronavirus: Macron declares second national lockdown in France
title_page: Coronavirus: Macron declares second national lockdown in France - BBC News
maintext: After the economy picked up in the third quarter, it now looks inevitable that it'll contract again between now and the end of the year, and for the whole of 2020 the government's predicting a 10% fall in GDP.
